screenshots.caption: Detect and Redirect to stop page

name: Defa Website Protector
short_description:
Defa Website Protector - Protect Front End HTML Changing and Hacking without Mutation Event.

This project code make it simple and support all browser include old browser and low on resources as much as possible. If you like our simple project. Don't forget to support the developer

http://www.juthawong.com/donate

Caution : Might create buggy user experienced for html page that have a lot of dom change such as bootstrap , html5 animation , slider profile , google customer search engine.
summary: Protect Front End HTML Changing and Hacking without mutation event
